title: Insider Trading Tip
description: You receive a hot tip! One of your stocks gets a 20% boost.

title: Tax Audit
description: The taxman cometh. Pay $200 in fines.

title: Market Manipulation
description: Caught in a scheme! Pay $500 fine.

title: Stock Scandal
description: One of your stocks is caught in a scandal. Loses 25% value.

title: Government Contract
description: You land a lucrative deal! Gain $600.

title: Brilliant Analyst Hire
description: Your new analyst boosts portfolio! All stocks gain 5%.

title: Currency Devaluation
description: Your home currency drops. Lose 10% on all stocks.

title: IPO Success
description: An IPO you invested in explodes! Gain $500.

title: Office Fire
description: Your office burns down. Pay $250 for repairs.
